title: Median Salary of Women Per Year
summary: This chart shows the amount of Median Salary on Salary Women Per Year in millions of 1000 per Year in the Year .
\\n From the chart we see that in the Year approximately 290 % of 1000 were Salary on Salary Women Per Year in 2015 as the highest in the world .
The lowest amount of Median Salary on Salary Women Per Year in the world is 2000 at approximately 150 % of 1000 .
gold: 2015 saw women median pay rise to 53 k , from 50 k in 2010 . 2005 it was at 45 k from 40 k in 2000 , so you can see it has been rising steadily
